title: @Riot KateyKhaos , are these champions eligible for skins or do they need VuÂ´s first ?
body:
1. {{champion:69}} 2. {{champion:74}} 3. {{champion:30}} 4. {{champion:80}} 5. {{champion:68}} 6. {{champion:98}} 7.{{champion:91}} 8.{{champion:45}} 9.{{champion:112}} 10.{{champion:143}}. 

And before people start filling the comments with Yoricks or Urgots, know that those champions need VU´s first , and we have those needs confirmed by Riot. As for Poppy and Taric, relax , they are recent updates, so it could take a while to receive skins. Look at Sion, who got rework in November 2014 but only got his skin recently

replies.body:
Hey! 

Taking a quick look here, looks like all of these guys and girls are eligible for skins at the moment!
Is my op Master Yi eligible for a skin? Id luv something better than Project.
Yup, sure is!
So do you have any plans to add him on this list? Along with zyra? I really would like some love for my main. ðŸ˜€
He's been on the list. :P Zyra wasn't for a bit due to her update, but she's eligible again.
How long do skins take to make and put out? . ;_; ~ I love Zyra.

It varies - it's more of a case by case. Lower tier skins may only take a couple weeks, whereas an ultimate skin can take upwards of a year to develop. The time is reliant on the content of the skin - new VO takes a bit to record, as does creating new  tech for the skin, if it's needed (i.e. DJ Sona's form swaps). 

Our team is pretty large, so we're able to work on a good chunk of skins at a time, so we have more than just the next patch's content in the works at any given time. :)
You should make an ultimate skin for Pantheon since his new lore made him into a god basically :P{{champion:80}}

I've been thinking of this ever since the new lore came out for {{champion:98}} , but how about a skin for him that's a blatant tribute / rip-off of Avatar: The Last Airbender with *some* skin showing (need to keep his eyes hidden, of course), nomad style robes, and blue tattoos? I mean, you have Super Galaxy {{champion:68}} as a blatant tribute / rip-off of Gurren Lagan, so why not, right?
Why would you need to keep his eyes hidden? They glow blue in the Avatar State already :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hud6ZU7V,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-01T21:17:04.805+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Taking a quick look here, looks like all of these guys and girls are eligible for skins at the moment!

I know it's no place to ask in this thread but what about Shaco?
I heard on the Shaco subreddit that he might be getting one in 2017 so I got super excited
I'm not sure about any update for him, so that one I'm not sure about. D:

Karthus, Shen, Heimer, and Viktor have all already gotten a VU

And Pantheon has fairly recently received a skin

> [{quoted}](name=AvantelWings,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hud6ZU7V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-27T02:44:38.719+0000)
>
> Karthus, Shen, Heimer, and Viktor have all already gotten a VU
> 
> And Pantheon has fairly recently received a skin

Legacy Skins donÂ´t count
what do you mean by that?

> [{quoted}](name=Moonboy65,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hud6ZU7V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-27T03:19:31.491+0000)
>
> what do you mean by that?

Katey has confirmed that a champion that received a legacy skin is still a option for a future skin, since the one they got is not going to be availible for most of the time. So Slayer Panth and SSW Talon do not count as skins for the skin cycle.
Yes,but the fact that he received a legacy skin at all means that he is able to get skins(also slayer pantheon was originally planned to be permanent,but was changed to legacy due to fan demand)
correct, and his 2 last skins were not Legacy

Are you kidding me!? {{champion:69}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:143}} Already got visual Updates (some of them already got skins after that)...and the rest mentioned already got skins before their VU, so Im not sure what you are talking about.

Talon doesn't need a VU, but he _definitely_ needs more skins.

Soul Reaver Talon:
http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/218/2/d/soul_reaver_talon_by_blandstufftastesnice-d7tx3xf.png

> [{quoted}](name=Sciraen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hud6ZU7V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-27T03:34:54.147+0000)
>
> Talon doesn't need a VU, but he _definitely_ needs more skins.
> 
> Soul Reaver Talon:
> http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/218/2/d/soul_reaver_talon_by_blandstufftastesnice-d7tx3xf.png

Make it an Ultimate skin, and I'll still buy it.
Karthus, Heimer, Viktor, Zyra and Shen should be fine for skins. The rest are iffy

> [{quoted}](name=Crett,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hud6ZU7V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-27T02:36:40.407+0000)
>
> Karthus, Heimer, Viktor, Zyra and Shen should be fine for skins. The rest are iffy

Not to sure on Zyra , I think she could use some help, but not sure. I think Kennen could use some help , but Riot gave him a Blood Moon skin (Thank Fucking Jesus, after a 4 year wait)
